meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Veronica, typically with small blue or white flowers.
meanings.sent1: The speedwells in the garden bloomed beautifully this spring.
meanings.sent2: I love how the speedwells add a touch of color to the meadow.
meanings.sent3: The speedwells whispered secrets to the bees buzzing around.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like the delicate speedwells in the morning dew.
meanings.sent5: The speedwells danced in the gentle breeze, enchanting all who passed by.

meanings.definition: A type of wildflower commonly found in meadows and fields.
meanings.sent1: We went on a nature walk and spotted some lovely speedwells.
meanings.sent2: The speedwells swayed gracefully in the meadow, kissed by the sun.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel hid his acorns among the speedwells.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter bubbled up like a field of cheerful speedwells.
meanings.sent5: The speedwells painted the landscape with hues of blue and white.
